author: David Rosenberg
title: David Rosenberg: It’s time for investors to start saying the D-word — this economic damage could be double 2008
description: David Rosenberg: We are dealing with a health shock, a self-imposed economic shock and a financial shock all at once
content: I find it fascinating that so many pundits are willing to tell their clients to stay the course after more than a 30-per-cent market meltdown. They have been saying the same thing the whole way through, and my wager is that they will tell you the same claptra… [+8792 chars]
